## RawTermsFacet.slots property

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Indicates that the facet is created as a partition of a numeric range. In the front will be managed as a terms facet but will be interpreted as a range in the back.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
slots?: boolean;
```
